content: Enable this option if the current user does not have rights to read from LDAP server, and enter the credentials of another user with the read rights.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a tooltip that explains the purpose of enabling LDAP authentication when another user has read rights. It provides context for users setting up LDAP authentication and appears in a UI component as a help button.

usage.context: className="toggle" isChecked={authentication} onChange={setIsAuthentication} isDisabled={!isLdapEnabled || isUIDisabled} />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "məlumatlarını" (information) is slightly awkward in this context. It implies personal details rather than authentication credentials.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "məlumatlarını" with a more specific term like "parol və istifadəçi adını" (password and username) or a more general term like "daxil etmələri" (entries).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is awkward. The phrase 'e introduzca' is not grammatically correct after 'si'. It should be 'y introduzca' or better yet, rephrase to avoid the imperative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Active esta opción si el usuario actual no tiene derechos de lectura del servidor LDAP y proporcione las credenciales de otro usuario con derechos de lectura.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'introduzca' is a possible translation for 'enter', it's overly formal and direct for a tooltip. A more natural phrasing would be 'ingrese'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Active esta opción si el usuario actual no tiene derechos de lectura del servidor LDAP y proporcione las credenciales de otro usuario con derechos de lectura.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "մուտքագրեք ընթերցման իրավունք ունեցող մեկ այլ օգտատիրոջ հավատարմագրերը" is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Armenian. "Enter the credentials of another user with read rights" is somewhat stilted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մուտքագրեք մեկ այլ օգտատիրոջ հավատարմագրերը, ով ունի ընթերցման իրավունք։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'immetti' is not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'enter' in this context. It sounds somewhat formal.

The word 'ເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ' (machine/server) is technically correct but could be more accurately translated to 'ເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP' to specify that it's the LDAP server being referenced. While understood, it lacks precision.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ໃສ່ຂໍ້ມູນການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ' (enter login information) is a bit wordy. A more concise phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃສ່ຊື່ຜູ້ໃຊ້ ແລະລະຫັດຜ່ານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ievadīt cita lietotāja akreditācijas datus' is a bit clunky and less natural in Latvian.  A more fluent translation would be 'norādiet cita lietotāja datus' or 'norādiet cita lietotāja autentifikācijas datus'.
The sentence structure 'introduceți datele de identificare' is slightly awkward in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be 'introduceți acreditările'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Activați această opțiune dacă utilizatorul actual nu are permisiuni de citire de pe serverul LDAP și introduceți acreditările unui alt utilizator cu permisiuni de citire.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "වත්මන් පරිශාර්තකයාට" (vathman parishaarthakayaata) which translates to "current user to" is awkward. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of "මوجود පරිශාර්තකයාට" (mooj parishaarthakayaata) or "වත්මන් පරිශාර්තකයා".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "වත්මන් පරිශාර්තකයාට" with "මوجود පරිශාර්තකයාට" or "වත්මන් පරිශාර්තකයා".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "අයිතියක්" (aithiyak) which means "right" is used twice in close proximity, making it slightly repetitive.  The second instance could be rephrased to avoid this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the second instance of "අයිතියක්" (aithiyak) to something like "මැතිවාරයෙකුගේ accès" or a similar construct to avoid repetition.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "පරිශාර්තකයාගේ සහතික ප්‍රදානය කරන්න" (parishaarthakayaage sahathik pradaanaya kardanawa) while technically correct, is a somewhat formal way of saying "enter the credentials of". A more user-friendly translation would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "පරිශාර්තකයාගේ සහතික ප්‍රදානය කරන්න" with something like "පරිශාර්තකයාගේ තොරතුරු ඇතුළත් කරන්න" (parishaarthakayaage thora thuru athulath karanna).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Omogućite' should be capitalized as it begins the sentence.
The sentence structure can be improved for better flow. 'i unesite akreditive drugog korisnika sa pravima čitanja' sounds a little clunky. Consider rephrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: i unesite podatke drugog korisnika koji ima prava pristupa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'akreditive' is a valid word, 'podatke' (data/credentials) might be a more natural and clearer translation of 'credentials' in this context for a Serbian audience.  'Akreditive' is more formal and technical.
The phrase 'Geçerli kullanıcısının' is grammatically awkward. It translates to 'The current user's', but sounds unnatural in Turkish in this context. It implies possession where it's not required.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcının LDAP sunucusu okuma hakları yoksa...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'kimlik bilgileri' (credentials) is a direct translation but feels a bit formal and technical for a tooltip. A more conversational alternative might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: okuma haklarına sahip başka bir kullanıcının bilgilerini
